Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Patrol Leader', 3: "Sir, the fight here's over...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard Leader', 3: "But is it really a good idea to take advantage of their tests to get Babylonia's new device to help clear out the Corrupted nearby?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Who gives a damn? They wanted authentic, accurate data—nothing beats data from a real fight.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A fallen Corrupted suddenly rises and sprints toward Watanabe at inhuman speed.'}

{3: "But its head is immediately crushed a few steps out—the CUB goes in and stomps for two more strikes, completely shattering the Corrupted into pieces before swiftly returning to Watanabe's side."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Hmm, good job...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He pats the head of the CUB, revealing an unusual smile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Patrol Leader', 3: 'Hey, is it just me, or is Mr. Watanabe being much gentler to the metal critter than he is to us?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard Leader', 3: "Damn... Stop it. You're gonna make me cry.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'All of a sudden, the CUB raises its head and takes a quick scan of the surrounding before running off in a direction.'}
{2: 'Patrol Leader', 3: "Is that a joke? Don't tell me it's broken already, running off like that...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'But Watanabe does not seem to be in a joking mood.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Everyone, get up! Follow it!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Patrol Leader', 3: "W-what's wrong?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Get in your vehicles! It detected hidden Corrupted outside of our patrol area, and it's heading there at full speed! The destination is—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hearing the location Watanabe says, all the Forsaken soldiers jump to their feet and hop on their vehicles, speeding behind the CUB without delay.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{3: 'After Watanabe departs the campsite, the children turn their attention to you, a stranger from Babylonia.'}
{3: 'Before the boys can act, the previously timid-looking girl walks up to you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ann', 3: '【kuroname】, is it? Nice to meet you, we are the members of the Forsaken Reserves K-107 Squad One—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "K-107, that's right! Once we grow up, we will graduate into the proper 107 Squad!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'Anyway, before Uncle—I mean, before Chief Watanabe returns, we will be accompanying you at our campsite.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "No need to worry. We'll keep you safe.", 4: '1'}
{1: '698', 2: 'I appreciate it.', 3: '49', 4: "I'll do the same.", 5: '50'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Xiuyong', 3: "Oh, you're welcome.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Deckard', 3: "Wonderful! Let's act together, then!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "In that case... let's continue our previous operation. But now that we have 【kuroname】 with us...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: "We're asking 【kuroname】 to join us now? But we're almost done...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Deckard', 3: "But we'll kill two birds with one stone while also getting to keep an eye on the supplier!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: "Isn't keeping an eye on the supplier the other bird?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: '...Maybe? Not that we can do it any other way!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The three youthful faces turn serious again. They put their heads together, discussing secretly.'}
{3: 'By the time they talk to you again, they seem to have come to a consensus among themselves, and they look at you with anticipation and barely hidden excitement.'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: 'Here—take this.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The boy reaches his hand out proudly, and in his palm is a poorly made lantern.'}
{3: "Its rough edges are even more noticeable being in a child's hand."}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: "We've been preparing this.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'Exactly... For Uncle Watanabe and his troop!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "Hmph! It's my idea, after all!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Deckard', 3: 'For decoration, obviously!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: 'Think about it—Uncle Watanabe just left with his men, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: "We hang this at the entrance of the campsite, and when the squad returns, they'll open the gate and find—", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "Hey, don't say it out loud! You know we aren't allowed near the entrance outside the camp!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Deckard', 3: "What are you so afraid of? We know they're not here.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "...And you just have to spoil it! What good does it do if our mission objective knows we can't go near it?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'You two bozos!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: "It's fine! We're just decorating! Nothing will go wrong with an extra pair of hands!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: 'We can even manage our time better while keeping 【kuroname】 in our line of sight!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Are you making me an accomplice?', 3: '75'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: 'Accomplice? No!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: "You're the reason Uncle Watanabe and his squad are out at this time of the year—", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Deckard', 3: 'And we got an extra mission because of you!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: "You aren't an accomplice—you're guilty! Helping us is the least you can do!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The two boys mean business, and they leave you no room for refusal.'}
{3: 'And the girl behind them has already laid out all the things she packed earlier, tallying everything carefully.'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "...It's too late to split up now. We have to take the supplier with us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: 'Just... to do what, exactly? Decorations... lanterns?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'Our next step is to clear out the trash near the entrance, then put our preparations to good use.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she finishes, she divides the decorations in front of her into three parts and hands one to each of you.'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: '...So, "supplier," do you also make New Year decorations, like, at the place you\'re from?'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "That's surprising...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "It'll be too sad to not even have something like this...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lowers her head and thinks for a while.'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "Um... We've made so many already, so what's one more? It'll be our payment to you once we're done decorating!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I look forward to it.'}
